The common method def full_name(first, last) "#{first}#{last}" end full_name('sam', 'smith') => "sam smith" Named parameters def parse(name: 'Jhon', hero: 'superman') "I am #{name}, the #{hero}" end parse => "I am Jhon, the superman" parse(name: 'Harry Potter', hero: 'wizard') => "I am Harry Potter, the wizard" parse(name: 'Luffy', food: 'meat') # ArgumentError: unknown keyword: food Any number of unnamed parameters def attributes(*args) args.
